cabin_name: Twin on lower deck
cabin_description: These standard inside cabins sleep up to two guests. They have single twin beds, a private bathroom with shower, a chair, and a TV.

cabin_name: Double on upper or middle deck with window (restricted view)
cabin_description: These standard outside cabins sleep up to two guests. They have a double bed, a private bathroom with shower, a TV, and a chair. These cabins have limited or no view, and those on Deck 5 look out on to the mid-level promenade deck.

cabin_name: Triple on upper or middle deck with window (restricted view)
cabin_description: These standard outside cabins sleep up to three guests. They have single beds (one converts into a sofa, one is an upper berth), a private bathroom with shower and a TV. These cabins have limited or no view, and cabin 523 overlooks the mid-level promenade deck.

cabin_name: Triple on middle and upper decks
cabin_description: These standard inside cabins sleep up to three guests. They have single beds (one converts into a sofa, one is an upper berth), a private bathroom with shower, and a TV.

cabin_name: Twin on lower deck with porthole
cabin_description: These standard outside cabins sleep up to two guests. Each come with a private bathroom and shower, TV, chair, hair dryer and porthole windows.

cabin_name: Double on lower deck with porthole
cabin_description: These standard outside cabins sleep up to two guests. They have a double bed, a private bathroom with shower, a TV, a chair, a hair dryer and porthole windows.

cabin_name: Suite on middle deck
cabin_description: Our most luxurious option. These spacious and elegant two-room suites sleep up to three guests. They have a separate bedroom, a private bathroom with shower and toiletries, a seating area with sofabed and armchairs, a TV, and tea- and coffee-making facilities.

cabin_name: Twin on lower deck with window
cabin_description: These standard outside cabins sleep up to two guests. They have single beds (one of which converts into a sofa), a private bathroom with shower, a chair, a TV, and a hair dryer.

cabin_name: Double on lower deck with window
cabin_description: These standard outside cabins sleep up to two guests. They have a double bed, a private bathroom with shower, a TV, a chair, and a hair dryer.

cabin_name: Double on lower deck with window
cabin_description: These standard outside cabins sleep up to two guests. They have a double bed, a private bathroom with shower, a TV, a chair, and a hair dryer.

cabin_name: Triple on lower, middle or upper deck with window
cabin_description: These standard outside cabins sleep up to three guests. They have single beds (one converts into a sofa, one is an upper berth), a private bathroom with shower, and a TV.

cabin_name: Double on middle deck with window
cabin_description: These comfortable outside cabins sleep up to two guests. They have a double bed, a private bathroom with shower, a chair, a TV, and tea- and coffee-making facilities.

cabin_name: Accessible twin on lower deck with window
cabin_description: This spacious wheelchair-accessible cabin sleeps up to 2 people. It has a wider door, accessible bathroom, adjustable bed, a chair, TV and hairdryer. We have a limited number of wheelchair accessible cabins, so we ask that they are booked by guests who require these cabins.

cabin_name: Double on upper deck with window
cabin_description: These comfortable outside cabins sleep up to two guests. They have a double bed, a private bathroom with shower, a chair, a TV, and tea- and coffee-making facilities.

cabin_name: Twin on lower deck
cabin_description: These comfortable, standard inside cabins for up to two people on the lower deck have separate beds, a chair, desk, and TV.

cabin_name: Double on upper or promenade deck with window (restricted view)
cabin_description: These comfortable, refurbished outside cabins for up to 2 people have double bed, a TV, a chair and small desk. The cabins come with a window for natural light, but have limited or no view.

cabin_name: Triple on upper deck with window (restricted view)
cabin_description: These comfortable, refurbished outside cabins for up to 3 people have separate beds, one of which converts into a sofa, and a TV. All come with a window for natural light, but have limited or no view.

cabin_name: Triple on promenade deck
cabin_description: These comfortable, refurbished standard inside cabins for up to 3 people have single beds, one of which converts into a sofa, private bathroom and a TV.

cabin_name: Twin on lower deck with porthole
cabin_description: These comfortable outside cabins for up to 2 people have separate beds, one of which can be turned into a sofa, and a chair. The cabins have portholes for natural light, but with limited or no view.

cabin_name: Double on lower deck with porthole
cabin_description: These comfortable outside cabins for up to 2 people have a double bed, a chair and a TV. The cabins have portholes for natural light, but with limited or no view. Please note these cabins may experience noise.

cabin_name: Two-bed suite on promenade deck
cabin_description: Our most premium cabins.  These elegant, refurbished suites situated on the mid-level walking deck have separate bedroom a seating area with a sofa that converts into a double bed. They also come with free Wi-Fi, TV, hairdryer, bathrobes, blanket, and espresso machine.

cabin_name: Twin on lower deck with window
cabin_description: These standard outside cabins for up to 2 people have twin beds, mini sofa and a desk.

cabin_name: Double on lower deck with window
cabin_description: These standard outside cabins for up to 2 people have double bed, minisofa and a desk.

cabin_name: Triple on lower deck with window
cabin_description: These standard outside cabins for up to 3 people have single beds, one of which is an upper berth, minisofa, desk, and TV.

cabin_name: Double on lower deck with window
cabin_description: These comfortable, refurbished cabins for up to 2 people have a double bed, minisofa and a TV.

cabin_name: Triple on promenade or upper deck with window
cabin_description: These comfortable, refurbished cabins for up to 3 people have single beds, one of which can be turned into a sofa, and TV. All cabins come with window for natural light, but some have a limited view.

cabin_name: Double on promenade deck with window
cabin_description: These comfortable, refurbished outside cabins on the mid-level walking deck for up to 2 people have a double bed, a chair, a small desk, TV, and coffee and tea facilities.

cabin_name: Mini suite on upper deck
cabin_description: These comfortable, refurbished mini suites for up to 2 people have a double bed, seating area, free Wi-Fi, TV, hair dryer, bathrobes, and espresso machine.

cabin_name: Two-bed mini suite on upper deck
cabin_description: These comfortable, refurbished suites for up to 4 people have a double bed, seating area with sofabed, free Wi-Fi, TV, hairdryer, bathrobes, and espresso machine.

cabin_name: Accessible twin on lower deck with window
cabin_description: This wheelchair-accessible cabin for up to 2 people have a wider door, accessible WC and adjusted bed, as well as a small sofa, a table, desk and hairdryer. ( We have a limited number of wheelchair accessible cabins, so we ask that they are booked by guests who require these cabins. Please inform us in advance of your disability - you will find Hurtigruten contact information on the Booking Confirmation document. )

cabin_name: Double on upper deck with window
cabin_description: These comfortable, refurbished outside cabins for up to 2 people have a double bed, a chair and small desk, TV, and coffee and tea facilities. All come with a window, but cabins 612, 614 and 616 have a limited view.

cabin_name: Twin on lower or middle deck
cabin_description: These comfortable, standard inside cabins for up to two people have private bathrooms and twin beds, one of which converts into a sofa.

cabin_name: Twin on middle or upper deck with window (restricted view)
cabin_description: These comfortable outside cabins for up to two people have separate beds, one of which converts into a sofa, and private bathroom. They have windows for natural light, but with limited or no view.

cabin_name: Double on middle or upper deck with window (restricted view)
cabin_description: These refurbished outside cabins sleep up to 2 people in a double bed. They comes with a private bathroom, chair, TV and hair dryer. The cabins have a window for natural light, but with limited or no view.

cabin_name: Twin on lower deck with window or porthole
cabin_description: These comfortable outside cabins for up to 2 people have separate beds, one of which converts into a sofa, and private bathrooms with shower. Most cabins in this grade have portholes - opt for cabin 309, 310, 311 or 312 if you'd prefer a window with a full view of the coast.

cabin_name: Two-bed suite on promenade deck
cabin_description: Our most luxurious option. These spacious suite for up to 4 guests have separate bedroom, living area with sofa bed, minibar and TV.

cabin_name: Two-bed suite on upper deck
cabin_description: These exclusive suites sleep up to 4 guests, with a double bed, sofabed and seating area, mini bar and TV. They also boast a bay window with a full view of the coast.

cabin_name: Twin on promenade deck with window
cabin_description: These refurbished outside cabins located on the mid-level walking deck sleep up to 2 guests. They come with twin beds, private bathroom with shower, and a TV. Please note that cabins 543, 545 and 546 may experience noise from the outside doors.

cabin_name: Double on lower deck with window
cabin_description: These refurbished outside cabins sleep up to  2 guests in a double bed. They come with a private bathroom with shower and a TV. Both cabins in this grade are inter-connected, making them a great choice for families.

cabin_name: Triple on lower deck with window
cabin_description: These refurbished outside cabins sleep up to 3 guests in separate berths (one converts to a sofa, one is an upper berth). All come with private bathroom and shower, and a TV. Please note that cabins 337, 339 and 341 may experience noise and vibration.

cabin_name: Twin on upper deck with window
cabin_description: These comfortable outside cabins sleep up to 2 people in twin beds, one of which converts into a sofa. They come with private bathroom and shower, TV and window with a view of the coast.

cabin_name: Triple on lower deck with window
cabin_description: These outside cabins sleep up to 3 people. The cabin has a single bed/sofa with two pullman beds, full view and TV.

cabin_name: Twin on promenade deck with window
cabin_description: These comfortable outside cabins for up to 2 people have a private bathroom with shower and separate twin beds, one of which doubles as a sofa.

cabin_name: Double on promenade deck with window
cabin_description: These comfortable cabins on the mid-level walking deck sleep up to  2 people, with double bed, private bathroom and TV.

cabin_name: Mini suite on upper deck
cabin_description: These comfortable suites have a double bed, TV, minibar, bathroom with shower, and great view.  Please note that suite 643 is wheelchair accessible; please contact us to book.

cabin_name: Mini suite on upper or promenade deck
cabin_description: Our mini suites come with a double bed and sofa bed, minibar and TV. Please note that cabins 517, 518, 605 and 606 have two smaller windows.

cabin_name: Accessible twin on lower deck with window
cabin_description: Our wheelchair-accessible cabin sleeps up to two people in twin beds. It comes with a wider door, accessible toilet and adjusted bed.  We have a limited number of wheelchair accessible cabins, so we ask that they are booked by guests who require these cabins.

cabin_description: These comfortable suites have a queen-sized bed, seating area with sofa, TV, kettle with tea/coffee, internet access and minibar.

cabin_name: Large double on middle deck with window (restricted view)
cabin_description: These large, comfortable cabins have a small double bed, seating area with sofa and a fridge with minibar. The cabins have windows, but with very limited or no view.

cabin_name: Twin on lower, middle or upper deck with window
cabin_description: These comfortable outside cabins for up to two people have separate twin beds. Please note that cabin 459 may experience noise.

cabin_name: Double on middle or upper deck with window
cabin_description: These comfortable outside cabins for up to two people have a double bed and a window with a full view. Please note that cabins 492 and 494 may experience noise.

cabin_name: Unspecified Polar Inside cabin
cabin_description: These unspecified Polar Inside cabins for two people have bathrooms with shower/WC.

cabin_name: Accessible triple on middle deck with window
cabin_description: Wheelchair-accessible room for up to three people with wider door, accessible WC and one adjustable bed. The cabin has separate beds.

cabin_name: Twin on lower deck
cabin_description: These comfortable, standard inside cabins for up to 2 people have separate beds (one of which converts into a sofa), private bathroom and chair and desk. Please note that these cabins may experience noise and vibration.

cabin_name: Twin on lower or upper deck with window (restricted view)
cabin_description: These comfortable outside cabins for up to 2 people have twin beds, one of which converts into a sofa, and a chair and desk. All come with a window for natural light, but the view is limited.

cabin_name: Single on upper deck
cabin_description: These comfortable standard inside cabins are ideal for solo travellers on a budget, with single bed, private bathroom and chair and desk.

cabin_name: Twin on middle or upper deck
cabin_description: These comfortable, standard inside cabins for up 2 people have separate beds, one of which converts into a sofa, private bathroom, a chair and desk, and a hairdryer. Many of the rooms are interconnected, making them a good choice for families.

cabin_name: Quadruple on lower deck with porthole
cabin_description: These comfortable outside cabins for up to 4 people on the middle or lower decks have bunk beds and a chair. Some have a double bed and bunk beds, sofa, and a chair.

cabin_name: Twin on lower deck with porthole
cabin_description: These standard outside cabins for up to 2 people have bunk beds, one of which converts into a sofa, and a chair with desk. All come with porthole. Cabins 314 and 316 have an inter-connecting door, making them a good option for families.

cabin_name: Triple on lower deck with porthole
cabin_description: These comfortable outside cabins for up to 3 people have separate beds, one of which doubles as a sofa, a chair, and a porthole. Please note cabin 301 may experience noise.

cabin_name: Mini suite on upper deck
cabin_description: Our refurbished mini suites sleep up to 2 guests and have separate bedroom with double bed, ample storage, seating area, TV, and coffee and tea facilities.

cabin_name: Accessible cabin on lower deck with window
cabin_description: Two wheelchair-accessible rooms for up to 5 people. These spacious cabins have wider doors, and accessible WC. One has double bed, pullman and a single bed. One has bunk beds, sofa, and chair.

cabin_name: Double on middle or upper deck with window
cabin_description: These comfortable, refurbished outside cabins for up to 2 people have a double bed, TV, hair dryer and coffee and tea facilities. Please note that some cabins may experience noise.

cabin_name: Wheelchair accessible cabin for up to 3 travellers
cabin_description: Wheelchair accessible cabin for up to three people with wider door, accessible WC and adjusted bed. This comfortable outside cabin on the middle deck have upper and lower berths.

cabin_name: Twin on lower deck
cabin_description: These comfortable, standard inside cabins for up to 2 people have separate beds, one of which converts into a sofa. All cabins have private bathrooms and a desk and chair.

cabin_name: Quadruple on lower deck
cabin_description: These spacious inside cabins are ideal for larger groups, sleeping up to 4 people in bunk beds. All cabins have private bathrooms and chair with desk.

cabin_name: Twin on upper deck with window (limited view)
cabin_description: These comfortable outside cabins for up to two people have private bathrooms and separate beds, one of which converts into a sofa. All come with porthole for natural light, but limited view.

cabin_name: Triple on upper or middle deck with window (restricted view)
cabin_description: These comfortable outside cabins for up to 3 people have private bathrooms and separate beds, one of which converts into a sofa. The third bed is an upper berth. All come with a porthole for natural light, but limited view.

cabin_name: Twin on upper deck
cabin_description: These comfortable, standard inside cabins for up to 2 people have twin beds, one of which converts into a sofa. All cabins have private bathrooms and a desk with chair.

cabin_name: Twin on lower deck with porthole
cabin_description: These comfortable outside cabins for up to 2 people have private bathrooms and separate beds, one of which converts into a sofa. The cabins have portholes, some with limited or no view.

cabin_name: Suite on middle deck with balcony
cabin_description: These smaller but elegant suites sleep up to 2 guests, with a double bed, seating area, private bathroom, minibar and a private balcony.

cabin_name: Grand Suite on middle or upper deck
cabin_description: These exclusive and spacious suites come with double bed, separate lounge area, and private bathroom with shower and/or bathtub. Cabins 775 and 780 also have a private balcony, giving you a front-view seat on the coast.

cabin_name: Two-bed suite on upper deck
cabin_description: These exclusive suites sleep up to 4 guests, with a double bed, sofabed and seating area, mini bar and TV. They also boast a bay window with a full view of the coast.

cabin_name: Owners' Suite on upper deck
cabin_description: Our most luxurious cabins. These spacious suites come with separate bedroom, a seating area and dining table, and private bathroom with bathtub. Enjoy views of the coast thanks for floor-to-ceiling windows that open out on to your own private balcony. Travel the best way possible!

cabin_name: Twin on lower deck with window
cabin_description: These comfortable outside cabins for up to 2 people come with twin beds, chair with desk and private bathroom.

cabin_name: Twin on lower or promenade deck with window
cabin_description: These comfortable outside cabins on the mid-level walking deck sleep up to 2 guests in twin beds. All come with private bathrooms, TV, hair dryer and desk with chair. Some cabins have an inter-connecting door, making them a good option for families. Please note that cabin 415 has a porthole.

cabin_name: Middle deck for two travellers
cabin_description: These standard outside cabins for up to two people on the middle decks have double beds.

cabin_name: Twin on promenade deck with window
cabin_description: These comfortable, outside cabins for up to 2 people have a private bathroom and separate beds, one of which doubles as a sofa. All come with TV, hair dryer and tea and coffee facilities.

cabin_name: Mini Suite on middle deck
cabin_description: These comfortable suites sleep up to 2 guests and come with double bed, seating area, TV, Wi-Fi, tea and coffee and minibar.

cabin_name: Large cabin on promenade or middle deck with window (restricted view)
cabin_description: These large, comfortable cabins sleep up to 2 guests in either twin or double bed. All come with private bathroom, TV, hair dryer and tea and coffee facilities. All have a window or porthole for natural light, but the view is limited.

cabin_name: Double on middle or upper deck with window
cabin_description: These comfortable cabins for up to 2 people have a private bathroom and separate beds, one of which doubles as a sofa. All come with TV, hairdryer and tea and coffee facilities. Many of the rooms have an inter-connecting door, making them a good option for families.
